10keyz Education & Consulting offers both introductory and advanced courses on spatial data exploration, analysis, and visualization.

-   Spatial data exploration, analysis, and visualization in R (scheduled 6-9 May 2025 [http://prstats.org](http://prstats.org/))

-   General data exploration with R

-   Introduction to data visualization

Our courses are designed to provide practical, hands-on experience to help you master data analysis and visualization tools.
